Description: This beautiful renovated three bedrooms apartment is located on the 1st floor of the house, hardwood floors throughout. It has a living room, remodeled kitchen with new appliances, three bedrooms, one and a half bath. Washer and drying hookup in the apartment. Utilities are not included. Central heat and a/c. Very convenient to highway, shopping centers, park and bus and T access. Available 09/01. Please call: Varada Properties
